definitions.definition: A chemical element ( symbol Ir) with an atomic number of 77: a very hard, brittle, silvery-white transition metal of the platinum group .
A single atom of this element.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A chemical element ( symbol Ir) with an atomic number of 77: a very hard, brittle, silvery-white transition metal of the platinum group .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A single atom of this element.
